Which of the following are absolute grounds for refusal of
                                registration?
options: Marks containing obscene or scandalous matter
answers: Marks containing obscene or scandalous matter

text: Which of the following are conditions of passing off?
options: The defendant made a representation that is likely to deceive the public
answers: The defendant made a representation that is likely to deceive the public

text: Which of the following leads to infringement of a trademark?
options: Identity with registered mark and similarity
Unauthorised use of trademark on packaging
Voluntarily licensing use of a trademark
answers: Identity with registered mark and similarity
Unauthorised use of trademark on packaging
